title: Navaratna Kundan Haaram - A Kaleidoscope of Tradition
materials: Kundan Setting with Uncut Diamonds (Polki). Features Hyderabadi Polish for enduring luster.
features: Classic Navaratna design, featuring nine auspicious gemstones set in a symmetrical arrangement. The gemstones are intricately carved and surrounded by Polki diamonds in a Kundan setting. The links are adorned with small Polki diamonds for added sparkle. Design is inspired by traditional South Indian temple jewelry.
occasions: and other auspicious traditional ceremonies. Also suitable for upscale modern events where a touch of cultural elegance is desired.
description: This Navaratna Haaram is more than just a necklace; it's an heirloom. Each gemstone is carefully selected for its quality and auspicious properties, believed to bring prosperity and good fortune. The Kundan setting, a hallmark of Hyderabad's rich jewelry tradition, showcases the exceptional craftsmanship. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine. A perfect blend of tradition and elegance, making it a prized possession for generations to come.
